font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 61.40%;top: 12.04%;width: 10.62%;height: 4.86%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
あなたの
お母様に会って
入って良いと
伺ったので
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 79.30%;top: 36.43%;width: 15.75%;height: 8.38%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
あなたが
私の家に来て
お父様の仕事の品を
運ぶのよね。
行き違いが
あるかしら?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 9.13%;top: 44.98%;width: 16.71%;height: 12.82%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 49.46%;top: 48.16%;width: 6.56%;height: 3.27%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
2秒前に
それに
気付いたよ
ゴメン
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 77.15%;top: 54.12%;width: 12.41%;height: 8.55%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
歩いて来たの?
今日は大嵐が
来てたと
思うけど
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 11.04%;top: 69.62%;width: 13.84%;height: 8.55%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
遠くないし
傘を買ったの
